00025 #include "technotedialog.h"

00036 RainbruRPG::Server::TechNoteDialog::
00037 TechNoteDialog(ServerConfiguration* sc, QWidget* parent)
00038   : QDialog(parent)
00039 {
00040   this->setMinimumWidth(400);
00041   this->setMinimumHeight(300);
00042   this->setWindowTitle(tr("Server configuration"));
00043   this->serverConfig=sc;
00044 
00045   // The root layout
00046   QVBoxLayout *vb1=new QVBoxLayout(this);
00047 
00048   // The help label
00049   QLabel* helpLabel=new QLabel(
00050     tr("Every server can have a technical note. This is a multiline text "
00051        "that is shown in the client screen at the connection. It is intended "
00052        "to show technical informations.\n\n If You let this field empty, "
00053        "no text will popup at the connection to this server."),this);
00054   helpLabel->setWordWrap(true);
00055   vb1->addWidget(helpLabel);
00056 
00057   // The server description
00058   QLabel* descLabel=new QLabel(tr("Server technical note :"),this);
00059   vb1->addWidget(descLabel);
00060   teTechNote=new QTextEdit(this);
00061   teTechNote->setToolTip(tr("The server's multiline technical note"));
00062   vb1->addWidget(teTechNote);
00063 
00064   // The dialog's button
00065   QHBoxLayout *buttonLayout=new QHBoxLayout();
00066   vb1->addLayout(buttonLayout);
00067   buttonLayout->addStretch(100);
00068   QPushButton *btnOk=new QPushButton(tr("OK"), this );
00069   buttonLayout->addWidget(btnOk);
00070 
00071   // Connections
00072   connect(btnOk, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(accept()));
00073   connect(teTechNote, SIGNAL(textChanged()), this, SLOT(techNoteChanged()));
00074 
00075   initValues();
00076 }
00077 
00081 RainbruRPG::Server::TechNoteDialog::~TechNoteDialog(){
00082   delete teTechNote;
00083 }
00084 
00088 void RainbruRPG::Server::TechNoteDialog::initValues(void){
00089   teTechNote->setText(serverConfig->getTechNote().c_str());
00090 }
00091 
00095 void RainbruRPG::Server::TechNoteDialog::techNoteChanged(){
00096   std::string temp(teTechNote->toPlainText().toLatin1());
00097   serverConfig->setTechNote(temp);
00098 }
